author.name: Roberth Strand
author.bio:
Self-proclaimed cloud automator and platform builder.
Microsoft MVP, HashiCorp Ambassador, and very active Open Source enthusiast.

frontmatter.title: 2022 was a great year for GitOps
Our Collaborative Approach
frontmatter.description: At our core, we believe that delivering as a comprehensive team is the best approach for both our partners and customers. It enables us to actively and quickly tap into our collective expertise to solve any technical challenge, helping our customers find smart solutions to their problems in an efficient way.

frontmatter.title: Live Event - Introduction to GitOps
frontmatter.description: In this inaugural meetup event, we want to share our thoughts on the concept of GitOps, why we need it and how it can be implemented.
